title: Ferrari_The_Race_Experience_EUR_PS3-TMD
description:
TiTLE:  Ferrari_The_Race_Experience_EUR_PS3-TMD
SiZE:   51x50Mb
DATE:   02/28/2014
REGION: EUROPE (FREE)

The official Ferrari licensed videogame experience, Ferrari: The Race Experience features the world's most desired sports cars, including the Ferrari 458 Italia and Ferrari 599XX. Choose from an impressive stable of 34 Ferrari motors and race across 17 racetracks, including the street circuit Riviera and the ultra cool Fiorano test track. Players get their choice of GT Road Cars, GT Race Cars or Classic Cars. An all-new Assisted mode allows gamers of all skill levels to enjoy a Ferrari.


*All-new Career mode incorporating three racing classes.

*Intricate car customization suite.

*Quick Race, Arcade, Tournament and Time Trial modes.

*Ferrari 458 Italia race tutorial with Tiff Needell.

*Features 16-player LAN and Online multiplayer.
